featured.text: When asked what color is evoked by a letter or number, synesthetic people would persistently give the same answer even if tested months or years apart.

definition.zh_def: 持續不斷地，堅持不懈地
definition.en_def: In a manner that continues firmly or obstinately in a course of action despite difficulty or opposition.
definition.example: She persistently worked on her project until it was completed.
